title: S15 Ep90: Supernatural News/Parashare:  God Of Chaos Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare:  God Of Chaos Edition
description:
Darkness Radio crawls out of their tomb to investigate Supernatural News & ParaShare God of Chaos Edition!

Dave & Tim are here to brighten your week with more absurd and supernatural tales from around the world.
Dave's plans for his 101st birthday just got squashed with news that Apophis the Killer Asteroid may collidewith Earth in 2068. Troublesome toys are scaring up a second life. Are you worried about ghosts? Be more worried about Carbon Monoxide poisoning appearing to be paranormal phenomena! All that and more, PLUS your emails and calls featured today.

Call and share your supernatural encounters: 651-300-4977

Remember to help the show by rating and reviewing it on whatever app you use!

Get the best paranormal, true crime books and swag here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
